benak.tomas.crimemonitor.client

Class CrimeOverviewFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • benak.tomas.crimemonitor.client.CrimeOverviewFragment

  • public class CrimeOverviewFragment
extends Fragment
    CrimeOverviewFragment is a UI fragment class used to display the overview of all committed crimes.

    The overview is calculated from the given crimes summary, which encapsulates the data for all the committed crimes for the particular department and crime data interval.

    The crime overview consists of

    • list view with clickable items and with
    • a pie chart, that visualizes the toplist in proportion to the number of committed crimes of the toplist items

      The toplist displays the first DISPLAY_CRIMES_NUMBER most common crimes (also called "top crimes") and the "other crimes" item, aggregating all of the remaining crimes.

      This fragment reports the requests to display the complete crime list to its parent activity via the helper interface OnShowCrimeListListener.

      When the used selects the particular top crime, the fragment notifies its parent activity via the

    Author:
    Tom
    See Also:
    CrimesSummary, CrimeOverviewFragment.OnShowCrimeListListener

      the view used to display the pie chart

      the button used to enable the user to request the complete crime list display

      the list of crime items to display in both the toplist and the pie chart
